thread.title: Ground News - Rather than peace, war ravages the land of Jesus' birth

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Rather than peace, war ravages the land of Jesus' birth
text:
Summary by Ground News Rather than peace, war ravages the land of Jesus ' birth. As Christian nations celebrate the season of goodwill and peace, no one feels hypocritical in doing so. There are loud calls for Israel to stop the continuing fighting in Gaza. While not on the same scale as Israel, Hamas soldiers are still fighting. While Hamas continues fighting, so will Israel. examiner.com.au Rather than peace, war ravages the land of Jesus' birth Amidst the Christmas season, the land of Jesus' birth is plagued by war and conflict. Explore the grim reality and the hope for peace in this insightful article.
